metadata.Title: CVE-2015-8874 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.Description:
Stack consumption vulnerability in GD in PHP before 5.6.12 allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service via a crafted imagefilltobordercall.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8874` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libgd-tools - 2.1.0-3ubuntu0.1
libgd3 - 2.1.0-3ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libgd2 package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.1.0-3ubuntu0.1').
